abstract: Take your pesto beyond pasta by adding it to quinoa, potatoes and vegetables, writes Martha Rose Shulman in this week's Recipes for Health.
snippet: Take your pesto beyond pasta by adding it to quinoa, potatoes and vegetables, writes Martha Rose Shulman in this week's Recipes for Health.
lead_paragraph: In this week's Recipes for Health, Martha Rose Shulman has pulled out the hand blender to whip up extra batches of puréed basil to be frozen and enjoyed in various pesto dishes all winter.
